name: Tales From the Other World, Episode 1: Friendship, Cabin, Woods
name_original: Tales From the Other World, Episode 1: Friendship, Cabin, Woods
description:
In this textual adventure, you are playing a guy who's going to celebrate his birthday with his friends in a cabin lost into the woods. What could possibly go wrong?

Well, everything in facts, but it only depends on your actions. Every choice you make, every interactions you'll have will have consequences. For better... or for worse.
